channel.title: Stat edits?
channel.description: I have the moparscape 3.2 client, and it didnt come in a zipped folder. With moparscape 3.1, I could open a file and edit my stats. I had one account on 200 for each stat. (NOTE: THIS IS ON THE DEFAULT IP) With MoparScape 3.2, is there a way I can do this?

item.title: Stat edits?
item.dc:creator: @blade3575 blade3575
item.description:
@blade3575 wrote:

I did it by going to the folder HybridScape > characters > then finding the name of your character and looking down the text file then when you change everything you want, save it then start up the game and it should work. If it says youâ€™re already logged on then you should change what you changed back and it should work again.

Read full topic

item.title: Stat edits?

item.description:

I have the moparscape 3.2 client, and it didnt come in a zipped folder. With moparscape 3.1, I could open a file and edit my stats. I had one account on 200 for each stat. (NOTE: THIS IS ON THE DEFAULT IP) With MoparScape 3.2, is there a way I can do this?
